name: Slinger Jansen
content: Slinger Jansen Research Page My Research Welcome to my website. You’re probably here for my: email address (slinger.jansen@uu.nl), my phone number (+31619884880), my publications, my resume, my awesome PhD students, or my bio. Slinger Jansen is an associate professor at Utrecht University, where he leads the Software Ecosystems Security research group. He is one of the leading researchers in the domain of software ecosystems and co-founders of the International Conference on Software Business and International Workshop on Software Ecosystems. He is lead editor of the book “Software Ecosystems: Analyzing and Managing Business Networks in the Software Industry” and of several others. Currently, he has a guest appointment at LUT University, Finland. Furthermore, he is an associate editor for the Empirical Software Engineering journal. Besides his academic endeavors he actively supports new enterprises and sits on the boards of advisors of several start-ups. I can be contacted through: Slinger Jansen (Roijackers) Utrecht University PO Box 80.089 3508TB Utrecht The Netherlands slinger.jansen@uu.nl Phone: +31 6 19 884 880 Share this: Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Facebook Click to share on X (Opens in new window) X Privacy & Cookies: This site uses cookies.
